Details.name: Meghan Maina
Details.label: Cloud Engineer
Details.summary: I am a Cloud Engineer with a passion for technology and a desire to learn. I am a self-motivated individual who is always looking for ways to improve my skills and knowledge. I have experience working with cloud technologies such as AWS and Terraform. I am also proficient in programming languages such as Python, C++, and JavaScript. I am a team player who enjoys working with others to achieve common goals. I am looking for an opportunity to work with a dynamic team where I can contribute my skills and knowledge to help the organization achieve its objectives.

Experience.name: CloudmyTribe
Experience.summary: CloudmyTribe is a community of both upcoming and experienced cloud engineers who share knowledge and experiences in cloud computing. As a Cloud Engineer, I am responsible for managing cloud infrastructure, deploying applications, and monitoring performance through various hands-on projects. I also worked on automating processes using Terraform and Ansible.
highlights: Learning advanced cloud computing and networking skills alongside my peers, with the aim of being the best junior cloud engineers worldwide.

education.institution: Jomo Kenyatta University of Agriculture and Technology

projects.name: Cloud Resume Challenge
projects.description: The Cloud Resume challenge is a beeginner friendly project to deploy a static website using AWS resources. The project involves creating a resume website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and deploying it using AWS services like S3, CloudFront, and Route 53.
highlights: Gained hands-on experience with AWS services
